q: what's the benefit of this activity
pred: The activity of snow tubing down a snowy hill provides a fun and exhilarating experience for the participants. It allows them to enjoy the snowy landscape and the thrill of speeding down the hill. In the video, we see people of all ages participating in the activity, including a man in a wheelchair who is able to enjoy the ride despite his physical limitations. This activity promotes bonding and camaraderie among friends and family, as well as a sense of adventure and excitement.
